label: Value Axis Range and Tick
description: Customizer to set the range for the value axes and the tick spacing. If one of values are empty then it will not be applied to the chart.

properties.name: minValue
properties.label: Range Min
properties.description: The minimum value on the axis

properties.name: maxValue
properties.label: Range Max
properties.description: The maximum value on the axis

properties.name: tickUnit
properties.label: Distance
properties.description: The space between ticks, each multiple of this value will have a tick on the corresponding value of the Y axis
